languages.text: "Эльдары носят с собой кристаллы — Камни душ. Мне интересно, что это".

traits.locale_text: "Эльдары носят с собой кристаллы — Камни душ. Мне интересно, что это".

languages.text: "All Aeldari carry these crystals — spirit stones. I want to know what they are."
languages.original_text: "Эльдары носят с собой кристаллы — Камни душ. Мне интересно, что это".

traits.locale_text: "All Aeldari carry these crystals, the spirit stones. I want to know what they are."
"All Aeldari carry these crystals, the spirit stones. I want to know what they are."
"All Aeldari carry these crystals — spirit stones. I want to know what they are."
"All Aeldari carry these crystals — spirit stones. I want to know what they are."
"All Aeldari carry these crystals — spirit stones. I want to know what they are."

languages.text: “所有艾达灵族都带着这种水晶，也就是灵魂石。我想知道这些石头是做什么用的。”
languages.original_text: "All Aeldari carry these crystals — spirit stones. I want to know what they are."

traits.locale_text: “所有艾达灵族都带着这种水晶，也就是灵魂石。我想知道这些石头是做什么用的。”

languages.text: «Todos los Aeldari llevan esos cristales, las joyas espirituales. Quiero saber qué son».
languages.original_text: "All Aeldari carry these crystals — spirit stones. I want to know what they are."

traits.locale_text: «Todos los Aeldari llevan esos cristales, las joyas espirituales. Quiero saber qué son».

languages.text: 「すべてのアエルダリはこのクリスタル…魂縛石を持っている。これが何なのか知りたい」
languages.original_text: "All Aeldari carry these crystals — spirit stones. I want to know what they are."

traits.locale_text: 「すべてのアエルダリはこのクリスタル…魂縛石を持っている。これが何なのか知りたい」

languages.text: "Alle Aeldari tragen diese Kristalle bei sich — Seelensteine. Ich will wissen, was sie sind."
languages.original_text: "All Aeldari carry these crystals — spirit stones. I want to know what they are."

traits.locale_text: "Alle Aeldari tragen diese Kristalle bei sich — Seelensteine. Ich will wissen, was sie sind."

languages.text: « Tous les Aeldaris détiennent l'un de ces cristaux, une pierre-esprit. J'aimerais savoir ce que c'est. »
languages.original_text: "All Aeldari carry these crystals — spirit stones. I want to know what they are."

traits.locale_text: « Tous les Aeldaris détiennent l'un de ces cristaux, une pierre-esprit. J'aimerais savoir ce que c'est. »

languages.text: "Tüm Aeldarilerde bu kristallerden, ruh taşlarından var. Onların ne olduğunu bilmek istiyorum."
languages.original_text: "All Aeldari carry these crystals — spirit stones. I want to know what they are."

traits.locale_text: "Tüm Aeldarilerde bu kristallerden, ruh taşlarından var. Onların ne olduğunu bilmek istiyorum."
